verbs.description: [ARG0: About a dozen protesters] [V: heckled] [ARG1: Homeland Security Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen] [ARG2: about the Trump administration 's immigration policy] [ARGM-TMP: as she ate dinner at a Mexican restaurant in Washington] .

About a dozen protesters heckled Homeland Security Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen about the Trump administration 's immigration policy as [ARG0: she] [V: ate] [ARG1: dinner] [ARGM-LOC: at a Mexican restaurant in Washington] .
